title: The Faerie Godmother's Apprentice Wore Green
description: The village of Styesville has a dragon problem, and is in sore need of a knight in shining armor to solve it for them. Instead, they get a strange traveler in a ragged cloak they barely even notice at first. Worse still, it soon becomes clear the problem setting fire to their village isn't as simple as a dragonâ€¦
author: Nicky Kyle
